features: Hypoallergenic, alcohol free baby wipes provide instant moisturization, leaving your baby’s skin soft

body.description: Baby Dove Rich Moisture Baby Wipes Soothe and instantly moisturize your baby's skin after every diaper change with Baby Dove Rich Moisture Baby Wipes. Suitable for use all over your baby's body, these wipes effectively remove impurities while instantly moisturizing your baby's skin to leave it feeling soft and clean. They come in a convenient re-sealable package that keeps the baby wipes fresh and convenient for on-the-go cleansing. And with their extra-mild and non-irritating formula, these wipes are as gentle as water on your baby's skin. Hypoallergenic and alcohol-free, Rich Moisture Baby Wipes are suitable for use even on newborns. What’s in the Box: Baby Dove Rich Moisture Baby Wipes, 30 Count (Pack of 6).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At a Glance: Hypoallergenic and alcohol-free. Dermatologist and pediatrician tested. Baby wipes instantly moisturize and cleanse skin. Mild, non-irritating formula is gentle on skin. Re-sealable pack keeps baby wipes moist for longer. Baby Dove Rich Moisture Baby Wipes Soothe and instantly moisturize your baby's skin after every diaper change with Baby Dove Rich Moisture Baby Wipes. Suitable for use all over your baby's body, these wipes effectively remove impurities while instantly moisturizing your baby's skin to leave it feeling soft and clean. They come in a convenient re-sealable package that keeps the baby wipes fresh and convenient for on-the-go cleansing. And with their extra-mild and non-irritating formula, these wipes are as gentle as water on your baby's skin. Hypoallergenic and alcohol-free, Rich Moisture Baby Wipes are suitable for use even on newborns. What’s in the Box: Baby Dove Rich Moisture Baby Wipes, 30 Count (Pack of 6).

Cleanse and Moisturize for Clean, Soft Skin Baby Dove Rich Moisture Baby Wipes are suitable for using all over-not only on your baby's diaper area, but also on the hands, face, and body. The gentle formula provides instant moisturizing while cleansing away dirt and other impurities, leaving your baby's skin clean and hydrated. Re-Sealable Container Keeps Wipes Fresh Ideal for on-the-go use, these baby wipes come in a handy re-sealable pack that slips easily into a diaper bag. The package dispenses individual wipes with an easy pull, and it seals shut to keep the baby wipes moist and fresh. Hypoallergenic and Alcohol-Free for Gentle Cleansing Featuring a dermatologist and pediatrician tested formula, Baby Dove Rich Moisture Baby Wipes gives your little one's skin the gentle care it deserves. The hypoallergenic and alcohol-free formula was specially developed for delicate baby skin, making these wipes suitable for daily use--even on newborns. Directions for Use: Gently wipe skin. Once your baby's skin is dry, follow with Baby Dove Rich Moisture Baby Lotion to lock in moisture for up to 24 hours. Carefully close the seal after use to keep the baby wipes moist for longer.
Note: According to a 2016 independent survey conducted by IPSOS among US pediatricians.

About Baby Dove Rich Moisture Give your baby tip-to-toe moisturizing care with the Baby Dove Rich Moisture line of products. These products feature hypoallergenic formulas and fragrances specially designed for babies' delicate skin. From baby bathing bars to baby lotions, they help keep your little one's skin clean, soft and healthy-looking.

Baby Dove Rich Moisture Baby Bar Baby Dove Rich Moisture Tip to Toe Wash Baby Dove Rich Moisture Baby Shampoo Baby Dove Rich Moisture Baby Lotion Baby Dove Rich Moisture Baby Wipes Try Other Baby Dove Rich Moisture Products Helps replenish moisture and nutrients lost during bathing and leaves your baby's skin feeling soft Nutrient-enriched formula helps replenish essential nutrients and moisture lost during bath time Tear-free shampoo helps replenish the essential moisture and nutrients that your baby's scalp can lose during bath time Moisturizes and replenishes the skin barrier for up to 24 hours, leaving your baby's skin soft Effectively removes impurities while instantly moisturizing your baby's skin to leave it feeling soft and clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for between baths.
reviews.reviewText: I love these wipes for the days between baths. They have a light scent and are gentle on the skin. I dont use them for diaper changes so I dont know if they would cause any sort of rash or irritation due to being scented. I use them to wipe his face, neck, hands, etc to eliminate any sour milk smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2019
reviews.reviewText: These smell amazing. I wish they came in a larger pack or multi pack. They are expensive. But I am so hooked on the smell and gentleness on our babies super sensitive skin I'll pay the higher price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prefer these to most baby & facial wipes
reviews.reviewText: Great wipes. Mild scent. No shredding or lint. But not especially moisturizing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too much smell!
reviews.reviewText: I think that manufacturers should realize that a person with extra sensitive skin has probably also got a problem with strong scents and perfumes. These have a very potent scent to them. I liked the cloths but the scent killed my allergies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Strong, cheap fragrance! DO not use on skin!
reviews.reviewText: This smells so strongly from just the sealed pack, I cannot believe any knowledgeable person would touch their delicate baby's skin with it! It has that fruity floral smell that pervades Dove hair care products--not even a nice baby powder scent, to boot. Most fragrances are sensitizing to skin--there are exceptions like vanillin and cucumbers--so even if your baby doesn't have eczema now, why risk it? Besides, why have your baby smell like cheap hair care products, instead of like nice baby?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Not what I expected.. too large.. but I'll find another use for them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Left my baby's bottom super soft. Helped with diaper rash
reviews.reviewText: Left my baby's bottom super soft. Helped with diaper rash. Have not had to use diaper cream with this wipe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2017
